name: Gangster Run – Urban Crime Spree Paradise
name_original: Gangster Run – Urban Crime Spree Paradise
description:
***** Gangster mayhem! Action-packed!
***** Vegas and Miami gangstas on the loose!

The time is yester-year. Gangsters are on the loose wreaking havoc in the city. Can the cops stop them in time?

HOW TO PLAY:

Tap the lower left of screen to jump. Tap right side to shoot. Collect gold and silver coins to unlock new characters.

EXCITING FUN AND ITS FREE TO DOWNLOAD!!!

Challenge Your Friends for Highest Score!
Tons of fun!

Download ‘Gangster Run’ Now!!!

PLEASE NOTE: This game is free to play but does charge real money for additional content. You may adjust your settings to lock out this function.
